title: Dark elven broadsword
data:
| ) [File:Dark elven broadsword.png](/index.php?title=Special:Upload\&wpDestFile=Dark_elven_broadsword.png "File:Dark elven broadsword.png") |                                                         |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name                                                                                                                                       | dark elven broadsword                                   |
| Appearance                                                                                                                                 | etched broadsword                                       |
| Damage vs. small                                                                                                                           | 1d6+1d4                                                 |
| Damage vs. large                                                                                                                           | 1d6+1                                                   |
| To-hit bonus                                                                                                                               | +0                                                      |
| Weapon skill                                                                                                                               | [broadsword](/wiki/Broadsword "Broadsword")             |
| Size                                                                                                                                       | [one-handed](/wiki/One-handed "One-handed")             |
| Base price                                                                                                                                 | 45 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid") (+10/positive enchant) |
| Weight                                                                                                                                     | [20](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                             |
| Material                                                                                                                                   | [adamantine](/wiki/Adamantine "Adamantine")             |

A **dark elven broadsword** is a type of [weapon](/wiki/Weapon "Weapon") that appears in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"). It is a one-handed weapon that uses the [broadsword](/wiki/Broadsword "Broadsword") [skill](/wiki/Skill "Skill"). It is made of [adamantine](/wiki/Adamantine "Adamantine"), and appears as an **etched broadsword** when [unidentified](/wiki/Identification "Identification").

## Generation

[Drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\) "Drow (starting race)") characters start the game with knowledge of the dark elven broadsword.

[Lolth](/wiki/Lolth_\(EvilHack\) "Lolth (EvilHack)") is [always generated with](/wiki/Monster_starting_inventory "Monster starting inventory") a dark elven broadsword that has the venom [object property](/wiki/Object_property "Object property").

[Drow](/wiki/Drow_\(monster_attribute\) "Drow (monster attribute)") [sergeants](/wiki/Sergeant "Sergeant") have a 1⁄2 chance of generating with a dark elven broadsword, and drow [lieutenants](/wiki/Lieutenant "Lieutenant") have a 3⁄4 chance of generating with a dark elven broadsword. [Driders](/index.php?title=Drider_\(EvilHack\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Drider (EvilHack) (page does not exist)") have an effective 1⁄9 chance of generating with a dark elven broadsword, and other non-[undead](/wiki/Undead "Undead") drow have an effective 3⁄16 chance of generating with a dark elven broadsword, with the exception of [drow mages](/index.php?title=Drow_mage\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Drow mage (page does not exist)") and [drow clerics](/index.php?title=Drow_cleric\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Drow cleric (page does not exist)").

A dark elven broadsword can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining a [dark elven dagger](/wiki/Dark_elven_dagger_\(EvilHack\) "Dark elven dagger (EvilHack)") and a [dark elven short sword](/wiki/Dark_elven_short_sword_\(EvilHack\) "Dark elven short sword (EvilHack)") while the forge is darkened.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Dark_elven_broadsword\&action=edit)*
html:
Dark elven broadsword

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
) File:Dark elven broadsword.png
Name dark elven broadsword
Appearance etched broadsword
Damage vs. small 1d6+1d4
Damage vs. large 1d6+1
To-hit bonus +0
Weapon skill broadsword
Size one-handed
Base price 45 zm
(+10/positive
enchant)
Weight 20
Material adamantine

A dark elven broadsword is a type of weapon that appears in EvilHack. It is a one-handed weapon that uses the broadsword skill. It is made of adamantine, and appears as an etched broadsword when unidentified.

Generation

Drow characters start the game with knowledge of the dark elven broadsword.

Lolth is always generated with a dark elven broadsword that has the venom object property.

Drow sergeants have a 1⁄2 chance of generating with a dark elven broadsword, and drow lieutenants have a 3⁄4 chance of generating with a dark elven broadsword. Driders have an effective 1⁄9 chance of generating with a dark elven broadsword, and other non-undead drow have an effective 3⁄16 chance of generating with a dark elven broadsword, with the exception of drow mages and drow clerics.

A dark elven broadsword can be created at a forge by combining a dark elven dagger and a dark elven short sword while the forge is darkened.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

A '''dark elven broadsword''' is a type of [[weapon]] that appears in [[EvilHack]]. It is a one-handed weapon that uses the [[broadsword]] [[skill]]. It is made of [[adamantine]], and appears as an '''etched broadsword''' when [[identification|unidentified]].

==Generation==
[[Drow (starting race)|Drow]] characters start the game with knowledge of the dark elven broadsword.

[[Lolth (EvilHack)|Lolth]] is [[Monster starting inventory|always generated with]] a dark elven broadsword that has the venom [[object property]].

[[Drow (monster attribute)|Drow]] [[sergeant]]s have a {{frac|2}} chance of generating with a dark elven broadsword, and drow [[lieutenant]]s have a {{frac|3|4}} chance of generating with a dark elven broadsword. [[Drider (EvilHack)|Driders]] have an effective {{frac|9}} chance of generating with a dark elven broadsword, and other non-[[undead]] drow have an effective {{frac|3|16}} chance of generating with a dark elven broadsword, with the exception of [[drow mage]]s and [[drow cleric]]s.

A dark elven broadsword can be created at a [[Forge (dungeon feature)|forge]] by combining a [[Dark elven dagger (EvilHack)|dark elven dagger]] and a [[Dark elven short sword (EvilHack)|dark elven short sword]] while the forge is darkened.
